summary: [@ PayPalPlugin.dll@0x1be71][@ 0x0 | PayPalPlugin.dll@0x1be71] common null pointer dereference paypalfirefoxplugin@orbiscom

stack_traces.creator: timeless@bemail.org
stack_traces.raw_text:
I'm filing this bug to record an instance. This crash happens fairly regularly according to crash stats. Note that we intend to blocklist paypal's extension.

For a random day, we had crashes from 2.2.26.0 and 2.2.19.0:
  PayPalPlugin.dll@0x1be71|EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (12 crashes)
    100% (12/12) vs.   0% (268/89657) paypalfirefoxplugin@orbiscom
         92% (11/12) vs.   0% (33/89657) 2.2.19.0
          8% (1/12) vs.   0% (218/89657) 2.2.26.0
I can't find the 2.2.26.0 crash in the database,

User Comments	it crashed when I clicked on 'customize your firefox' if that helps. It does crash more than Google. AND I only use Firefox for paypal 'cause it lets me do more, than when I use Google. I would use FireFox for everything but it's sooooooooooooo slooooooooow in ebay. That's about the only reason I use the PC, for ebay, selling. (I do clear my cookies,too) You don't have to email me back, or start me up, this is a good time to say how slow Firefox is & maybe you can make it faster(I hope)
